channel.title: xCrafters Network | Positions needing filled
channel.description:
Hello, I am Dhumiston (kingdhum on R-S). Ignore the fact that I haven't been on moparscape in a very long time. I am developing an RSPS for a community i am owner of. I am currently looking to fill a few positions for my development team. Here is some background information about what our community has accomplished: [ul][li]We run three minecraft server; Tekkit Classic, Tekkit Lite, and Bukkit[/li] [li]We also run other game server such as Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas Multiplayer and DayZ[/li] [li]We have been hosting servers for over two years.[/li] [li]We were ranked #1 on multiple Minecraft Server Pages such as Minecraft-server-list and minecraftservers.org[/li][/ul] Here is the application:
Name: Age: Time Zone: Programming Languages: Are you involved in something at this time? If yes, what? Do you have any past work you can show to prove your skills? Would you prefer to work on server side, client side, or website/database? What is your skype name?
